mapper.select: select IDE.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE, P.PROC_CD_NAME, P.MCHN_NAME, PP.FLTY_VOL, PP.PROCESS_PERFOM_NO, NVL(fpd.flty_prcs_vol, '0') AS flty_prcs_vol, FPC.FIN_PRD_CD_NAME, IDE.WORK_DATE, PP.WORKER_NAME from BF_PROD_INST_DETAIL IDE join BF_PROD_PROCESS P on P.INST_PROD_NO = IDE.INST_PROD_NO join BF_PROD_PROCESS_PERFORMANCE PP on PP.PROCESS_NO = P.PROCESS_NO JOIN BF_CMN_FINISH_PRODUCT_CODE FPC ON IDE.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE = FPC.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE left outer join (SELECT PROCESS_PERFOM_NO, SUM(flty_prcs_vol) AS flty_prcs_vol from bf_prod_flty_prcs_details group by PROCESS_PERFOM_NO) fpd on fpd.process_perfom_no = pp.process_perfom_no where (pp.flty_vol > fpd.flty_prcs_vol and fpd.flty_prcs_vol is not null) or fpd.flty_prcs_vol is null and PP.FLTY_VOL > 0

SELECT PP.PROCESS_PERFOM_NO, FC.FAULTY_CD_CODE, FC.FAULTY_NAME, FPD.FLTY_PRCS_DATE, NVL(FPD.FLTY_PRCS_REMK, ' ') AS FLTY_PRCS_REMK, FPD.FLTY_PRCS_VOL, P.PROC_CD_NAME, P.MCHN_NAME, IDE.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE, FPC.FIN_PRD_CD_NAME, EMP.EMP_ID FROM BF_PROD_FLTY_PRCS_DETAILS FPD JOIN BF_CMN_FAULTY_CODE FC ON FPD.FAULTY_CD_CODE = FC.FAULTY_CD_CODE JOIN BF_PROD_PROCESS_PERFORMANCE PP ON FPD.PROCESS_PERFOM_NO = PP.PROCESS_PERFOM_NO JOIN BF_PROD_PROCESS P ON PP.PROCESS_NO = P.PROCESS_NO JOIN BF_PROD_INST_DETAIL IDE ON P.INST_PROD_NO = IDE.INST_PROD_NO JOIN BF_CMN_FINISH_PRODUCT_CODE FPC ON IDE.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE = FPC.FIN_PRD_CD_CODE JOIN BF_CMN_EMP EMP ON FPD.EMP_ID = EMP.EMP_ID ORDER BY FLTY_PRCS_DATE
